text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Henry Austin to Austin, Matamoros, August 3, 1829. Plans for navigation of Rio Grande. Has laid before Government of the United States a memorial suggesting exchange of its territory west of Rocky Mountains for that between Rio Grande and the United States.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-08-1829">August 8d. 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*My deab Sir I have written to you repeatedly during the last three years by *location_mentioned*New Orleans,*/location_mentioned* and from *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned* by mail as I have not recd replys I suppose my letters have miscarried*/p*
*p*I now avail my self of a direct opportunity to apprise you that I am here with a Steamboat and some goods for the purpose of ascending the *location_mentioned*River del norte*/location_mentioned* to open a commercial intercourse with the *location_mentioned*interior */location_mentioned*if practicable and taking up land for future benefit— It is extreemly doubtfull whether the enterprise will result in success I shall however give some months attention to it and not leave this country in any event before fall. It will be some weeks before I can get ready to start from this and Should opportunity offer I should be pleased to hear from you*/p*
*p*Your council after so much painfull experience would be valuable before leaving the *location_mentioned*US */location_mentioned*I laid before Govt a Memoir on the *location_mentioned*western boundary*/location_mentioned* pointing out the advantages of an exchange of the *location_mentioned*territory west of the Rocky Mountains*/location_mentioned* for the *location_mentioned*lands between the Del norte and the US*/location_mentioned* giving the *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*Govt one or two Millions to enduce the exchange-*/p*
*p*Should a sure conveyance offer I will Send you a Copy— I think something will ultimately be done on the subject*/p*
*p*do me the favor to let me "hear from you and beleive me always truly your friend and *person_mentioned*cousin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Henry Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
